parameters.jsonBody:
={

   "sku" : "{{ $('Article').item.json.EAN }}",
   "categories" :  {{ JSON.stringify($('Code').item.json.categs) }} ,
   "price" : "{{ $('Article').item.json.RetailPrice }}" ,
   "regular_price" : "{{ $('Article').item.json.RetailPrice }}" ,
   "manage_stock" : true,
   "stock_quantity" : {{ $('Article').item.json.QuantityAvailable }} ,
   "weight" :  "{{ $('Article').item.json.Weight }}" ,
   "name" : "{{ $('Article').item.json.ArticleText }}",
   "status" : "publish",
  
   "attributes" : [
       {  "id": 2, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.ManufacturerArticleId }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 3, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.BrandId }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 4, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.BrandName }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 5, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.PatternModelText }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 44, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.DotYear }}" ]  , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 10, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.Width }}" ]  , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 11, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.AspectRatio }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 12 , "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.Diameter }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 17, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.LoadIndex }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 18, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.SpeedIndex }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 20, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.WetGrip }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 25, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.SnowGrip }}" ]  , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 26, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.IceGrip }}" ] , "visible" : true },
       {  "id": 14, "options" : [ "{{ $('Article').item.json.Radial }}" ] , "visible" : true }
     ] ,
   "meta_data" : [  
       { "key" : "latakko-article" , "value" : "{{ $('Article').item.json.ArticleId }}" },
       { "key":  "_foreign_stock" , "value" :  "{{ $('Article').item.json.QuantityExternal }}"  },
       { "key":  "latakko" , "value" :  1  }

    ]  ,

   "images" : [{ "src" : "https://ipgarage.lv/wp-content/images/{{ $('Article').item.json["EAN"] }}.jpg" }]
  

  
}
